for i in range(input()):
    n=input()
    a=map(int,raw_input().split())
    d={}
    temp=[]
    max=0
    for term in a:
        if term not in d:
            d[term]=1
        else:
            d[term]=d[term]+1
    for i in d:
        if(d[i]>max):
            max=d[i]
    for i in d:
        if(d[i]==max):
            temp+=[i]
    print min(temp),max
